org.apache.lucene.queryParser.core

Class QueryNodeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.apache.lucene.queryParser.core.QueryNodeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable , NLSException
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QueryNodeParseException 

           public class
       
        QueryNodeException
       
       extends
       
        Exception
       
       implements
       
        NLSException

    This exception should be thrown if something wrong happens when dealing with QueryNode s.

    It also supports NLS messages.

    See Also:
    Message , NLS , NLSException , QueryNode , Serialized Form
